data.description: *Highest and Best due Sunday April 14th by 5:00pm*  Charming 3-bed, 1-bath ranch, perfectly situated on a peaceful dead-end street in the heart of Sterling Heights.  Recent updates include windows installed in '21, a sump pump in '22, and a bathroom renovation in '23. This property boasts a spacious basement, perfect for additional living space or storage, and the oversized 2 1/2 car garage offers plenty of room for vehicles and projects. Proximity to shopping, freeways, and dining options provides the ultimate convenience.
